name: Neoluddite Mindset: Stranded Assets
description:
created for global game jam online 2021
get lost in frozen desert, find all the towers and extract all the available resources. The world resources are shared by all the players online. 

Gamepad Reccomended:
right trigger: forward
left trigger: brake
left thumbstick: steer
right thumbstick: look
right shoulder button: analyze tower, extract resources
left shoulder button: zoom camera
